features: GILLETTE'S ULTIMATE SHAVING EXPERIENCE: GilletteLabs with Exfoliating Bar by Gillette is the world’s first razor with exfoliating technology built into the handle - for Gillette’s ultimate shaving experience
BUILT-IN EXFOLIATING BAR: Built into the handle, the exfoliating bar releases trapped hairs for a smooth shave
INCREDIBLE COMFORT AND CLOSENESS: This razor for men features Gillette’s sharp five blades specially designed for comfort and closeness
ADAPTIVE DESIGN: 2D FlexDisc contours to your face to ensure comfort and contact with every stroke
LONG-LASTING DURABILITY: The razor handle and exfoliating bar are built with precision engineering
INCLUDES: Premium Magnetic Stand to keep your razor clean, dry and ready to use
body.description: GilletteLabs with Exfoliating Bar by Gillette is the world’s first razor with exfoliating technology built into the handle - for Gillette’s ultimate shaving experience. The innovative exfoliating bar on this men’s razor releases trapped hairs from the face while the 2D FlexDisc technology contours to your face to ensure a smooth and comfortable shave. The razor handle is built with precision engineering. Featuring Gillette's 5 sharp razor blades, this razor for men is designed for a quick and easy shave. When you’re ﬁnished shaving, put your razor into its premium magnetic stand that keeps your razor clean, dry and ready to use. Use with GilletteLabs razor blade refills which are compatible with both the GilletteLabs with Exfoliating Bar and the GilletteLabs Heated Razor. Choose between a refreshing and exfoliating shave or the soothing warmth of a hot towel shave. The perfect gift for men, this razor represents the next generation in male shaving.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What does the exfoliating bar do? The exfoliating bar helps to release trapped hairs from the skin covering them so the five blades can focus on efficiently cutting hairs. How is this razor different from other Gillette razors? The GilletteLabs with Exfoliating Bar razor is designed for the ultimate Gillette shave. The metal razor handle includes an exfoliating bar and flex disc for a smooth shave. All GilletteLabs refills have 5 precision blades, lubrastrip, and a precision trimmer. How to change the cartridge 1. On the backside of the razor, push the circle towards the blade to eject the cartridge. 2. Hold the blade with your other hand and lift off of the razor handle. 3. Find your blade holder, hold it with the bottoms of the cartridges facing you. 4. Push handle onto new blade from handle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more knicks
reviews.reviewText: No matter the razor, my husband’s face after shaving has always looked like he had just come either a cage match or a traffic accident. I saw commercials for this product and was impressed (and a little skeptical) in making a difference. So, I ordered it. He has been so happy and relieved that he can finally get the results he has been wanting from a razor. I am very pleased that he now looks like his handsome self. You will not be disappointed in this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is totally worth your money
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to try a different razor. Saw the Gillette Labs and wow I am shocked. The way it gets so close to your face. No cuts no blood. Smooth feeling. Any shaving gel works. Definitely a must try and have for all men.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I give! It's a superior razor blade.
reviews.reviewText: I really tried not to buy these blades. I even tried an expensive, single-edge razor that's a fairly recent entry to the market. I had hoped to find a truly superior razor system. This one is by far the best razor I've used. I didn't rate it 5 stars because it is ridiculously expensive. That seems to be Gillette's way with every iteration of their Multi-Blade systems. This blade gives a very close shave with hardly any nicks or cuts. That's the kicker for me. I have really sensitive skin, and I like a very close shave. I've been using this razor for a couple of weeks, and I've only nicked myself twice. Previously, I had to use my Nick-Stick after every shave. So, I give the Gillette Labs razor 4 stars. I just wish they weren't so expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gillette Labs razor is excellent for the easily bruised skin of an older individual.
reviews.reviewText: I have gone with a full beard for the last 10 years--due to thin skin of older age. I bruise easily now a days and cuts just gush. Used with Gillett gel, this razor provides the best shave I have ever had, especially on the goat hairs around my Adam's apple. I now am able to style my sideburns with a once a week shave. This has really improved my appearance!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Blade Ever!
reviews.reviewText: Saw the ads and thought they were hilarious. This blade is really nice. best blade I ever owned for shaving. It pivots. And its got a nice heavy weight to it other blades don't have. Worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really my first time trying this product very happy about this product highly recommended will continue purchasing this brand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stick with the classic 5 blade...
reviews.reviewText: Definitely a downgrade from their other 5 blade razors. Only lasts a couple weeks of daily shaves before you start nicking yourself. And the exfoliating "attachment" makes it incompatable with their standard razor cartridges.That being said, it's decent. Stick with the OG blades.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gift for my picky brother
reviews.reviewText: I ordered for my younger brother who has just started shaving. He liked it so much, He asked me where I ordered it from so he could get more razor refills. He mentioned other razors tend to leave his skin, irritated or cause nicks, but this doesn’t. I went ahead and ordered from my father as well since my brother liked it so much
Está en un nivel elevado con respecto a otros rastrillos de repuesto. Su peso hace que puedas tener un mejor control.
Con una sola pasada que muy bien y lo mejor es que no me irrita la piel.
El rastrillo se siente ligero y el material mucho más simple que lo normal para un tipo de rastrillo de la gama de gillete y su precio. No termina de convencerme
This razor is a big improvement over the older one. It makes shaving a lot easer.
